api_list.name: get_todo_list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://todo4.p.rapidapi.com/todos/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "todo4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_todo
api_list.description: todo_id should be in todo1, todo3, todo2
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://todo4.p.rapidapi.com/todos/todo1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "todo4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://todo4.p.rapidapi.com/todos/{todo_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "todo4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
